name: Ryann's Spicy Grilled Fish Tacos
author: ryannodor
summary: These street-style grilled fish tacos have a great balance of spice and creamy queso fresco goodness. Delicious! If you really like spice, drizzle some sriracha on top!
ingredients: 1  jalapeno pepper, chopped, or to taste
3  tilapia fillets, or more to taste
directions: Place most of the cilantro into a blender, reserving the rest for garnish
Add sour cream, lime juice, jalapeno, and salt
Place sauce in refrigerator until ready to use
Preheat the grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Sprinkle tilapia fillets with onion powder, herbes de Provence, pepper, chives, and salt
Grill tilapia until fish flakes easily with a fork, 4 to 6 minutes
Place each tortilla between 2 damp paper towels
Heat in the microwave, about 20 seconds
Shred tilapia and arrange down the center of each tortilla
Squeeze lime juice over tilapia and top with cabbage and red onion
Spoon the cilantro sauce over the tacos and top with queso fresco
